title: Courtney Act puts on a leggy display in metallic dress at Maleficent 2 premiere
text:
She's one of Australia's most famous drag queens.

And on Wednesday, Courtney Act, also known as Shane Jenek, hit the London red carpet for the premiere of Angelina Jolie's Maleficent: Mistress of Evil.

The 37-year-old turned heads in a custom metallic dress, which featured a plunging neckline, and thigh-high slits.

Drag queen Courtney Act (pictured) put on a leggy display in shimmery metallic dress at the Maleficent: Mistress of Evil London premiere on Wednesday

Courtney opted for strappy silver gladiator-style heels that laced up high on her legs.

She accessorised her look with a matching clutch and dangling earrings.

The RuPaul's Drag Race star was all dolled up for the occasion, opting for a face full of contoured makeup, bronzer, lipgloss and and hint of pink blush.

Glamour: Courtney opted for strappy silver stiletto heels with round balls along the front

Drag stars! Courtney was joined by her fellow drag co-stars Charlie Hides and Ellis Atlantis who were even lucky enough to pose with the film's star Angelina Jolie (Pictured L-R) Charlie Hides, Ellis Atlantis, Angelina Jolie and Courtney

The Pop singer-turned-TV-personality completed her look by wrapping a piece of matching metallic material to her right arm.

Courtney was joined by her fellow drag co-stars Charlie Hides and Ellis Atlantis who were even lucky enough to pose with the film's star Angelina Jolie.

Courtney reached international stardom after landing in the top three of much-loved show Rupaul's Drag Race in 2014.

Just last year, she widened her fan base once again after she won Celebrity Big Brother in the UK.
description: She's of Australia's most famous drag queens. And on Wednesday, Courtney Act, also known as Shane Jenek, hit the London red carpet of Angelina Jolie's Maleficent: Mistress of Evil premiere.
authors: Ali Daher For Daily Mail Australia
